text: Monopeltis capensis, also known as the Cape worm lizard, South African shield- snouted amphisbaenian, or Cape wedge-snouted worm lizard, is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is found in South Africa, Botswana, and Zimbabwe. ==References== Category:Monopeltis Category:Reptiles of Botswana Category:Reptiles of South Africa Category:Reptiles of Zimbabwe Category:Reptiles described in 1848 Category:Taxa named by Andrew Smith (zoologist)
title: Monopeltis capensis
